welcome.name: Molong Bazar BL High School
welcome.about: Molong Bazar BL High School, located in Moheshpur Ghagar Bazar Sadullapur Gaibandha, operates under Dinajpur Education Board. Established on January 1, 1959, it offers co-educational programs in Humanities, Business Studies, and Science. The school is government-recognized and provides secondary-level education with EIIN 121437. Managed by Managing, it holds MPO status with number 8705081305. Situated in a Plain Land geography within constituency no. 3, the school's teachers have an average age of 40 years...
